#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
#define MAX 505
int a[MAX];
int main()
{
    int t,n,s,e;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            scanf("%d",&a[i]);
        sort(a,a+n);
        s=0;e=n-1;
        while(s<=e)
        {
            if(s!=e)
                printf("%d %d ",a[e],a[s]);
            else
                printf("%d ",a[s]);
            s++;e--;
        }
        printf("\n");
    }
}
/*
Input:
2
5
3 4 5 2 1
6
7 15 20 12 13 11

Output:
5 1 4 2 3
20 7 15 11 13 12
*/
